name: Silverback DeFi — Top Coins
description: Top cryptocurrencies ranked by market cap with price data
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns top tokens by market cap — no token-specific filtering.

name: Silverback DeFi — Whale Moves
description: Monitor whale buys, sells, and transfers for any token
paramHints: chain (default: base), symbol (token ticker e.g. 'AERO')

name: Silverback DeFi — Token Audit
description: Token security audit: honeypot detection, tax analysis, ownership risks
paramHints: chain (default: base), symbol (token ticker e.g. 'AERO')

name: Silverback DeFi — Technical Analysis
description: RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands technical analysis for tokens
paramHints: chain (default: base), symbol (token ticker e.g. 'AERO')

name: Silverback DeFi — Trending Tokens
description: Trending tokens and pools by volume and activity on a specific chain
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns trending tokens — no token-specific filtering.

name: Silverback DeFi — Top Pools
description: Top yielding pools on Base DEXes
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns top pools — no token-specific filtering.

name: Silverback DeFi — DEX Metrics
description: Base DEX ecosystem: volume, TVL, gas stats, top pairs
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns overall DEX metrics — no token-specific filtering.

name: Silverback DeFi — DeFi Yield
description: DeFi yield opportunities on Base
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns top yield opportunities — no token-specific filtering.

name: Gloria AI — News
description: Latest 10 crypto news headlines by category (ai, base, bitcoin, crypto, defi, ethereum, macro, solana)
paramHints: categories (required, one of: 'ai', 'base', 'bitcoin', 'crypto', 'defi', 'ethereum', 'macro', 'solana'. Use 'base' unless the query targets a specific category)

name: Gloria AI — Recaps
description: 12-24 hour news recap and sentiment summary by category
paramHints: categories (required, one of: 'ai', 'base', 'bitcoin', 'crypto', 'defi', 'ethereum', 'macro', 'solana'. Use 'base' unless the query targets a specific category)

name: Gloria AI — Ticker Summary
description: 24-hour token activity summary with key events and price context
paramHints: ticker (required: token symbol e.g. 'AERO', 'ETH', 'BTC')

name: Neynar — Cast Search
description: Search Farcaster casts by keyword for social sentiment and community discussion
paramHints: q (required: search keyword e.g. 'AERO' or 'Base')

name: Neynar — User Search
description: Search Farcaster users and profiles for community analysis
paramHints: q (required: search keyword e.g. 'vitalik' or 'aerodrome')

name: Neynar — Feed
description: Fetch a specific Farcaster user's feed by FID. Requires a known Farcaster user ID — not for general search
paramHints: fid (required: Farcaster user ID number). Only use if you know a specific user's FID.

name: Neynar — Channel Search
description: Search Farcaster channels for community and topic analysis
paramHints: q (required: search keyword e.g. 'defi' or 'base')

name: Elsa x402 — Search Token
description: Search for token by name or symbol across multiple chains. Use first to resolve token addresses for other Elsa endpoints.
paramHints: symbol_or_address (required: token symbol like 'AERO' or 0x address)

name: Elsa x402 — Token Price
description: Get token price with best-price discovery across 20+ DEX protocols. Requires chain and token_address.
paramHints: chain (required: 'base', 'ethereum', etc.), token_address (required: 0x contract address)

name: Elsa x402 — Analyze Wallet
description: Deep wallet analysis: holdings, PnL, risk scoring, diversification
paramHints: address (required: 0x wallet address), chain (required: 'base', 'ethereum', etc.)

name: Elsa x402 — Yield Suggestions
description: AI-powered yield farming recommendations based on risk profile
paramHints: wallet_address (required: 0x wallet address), chain (optional: 'base', 'ethereum', etc.), risk_level (optional: 'low', 'medium', 'high')

name: Elsa x402 — Gas Prices
description: Current gas prices across supported networks
paramHints: chain (optional: 'base', 'ethereum', etc.). No other params needed.

name: Elsa x402 — Portfolio
description: Multi-chain portfolio overview with balances and positions across 15+ chains
paramHints: address (required: 0x wallet address), chain (optional: 'base', 'ethereum', etc.)

name: Firecrawl — Web Search
description: Search the web and get LLM-ready markdown content. Use for breaking news, governance proposals, or data not covered by other endpoints
paramHints: query (required: search query string)

name: Einstein AI — Latest Pairs
description: Latest deployed tokens on-chain with liquidity pool data. Deep Bitquery intelligence

name: Einstein AI — Smart Money Leaderboard
description: Top trader wallets with buy/sell flow analysis and accumulation patterns. Deep Bitquery intelligence

name: Zapper — Token Price
description: Real-time token price, market cap, 5m/1h/24h price changes, volume, and liquidity
paramHints: address (required: 0x token contract address), chainId (required: chain ID e.g. 8453 for Base), currency (optional: default 'USD')

name: Zapper — Token Holders
description: List of token holders with balances, percentile shares, and identity info (ENS, Farcaster)
paramHints: address (required: 0x token contract address), chainId (required: chain ID e.g. 8453), first (required: number of holders to return), after (optional: pagination cursor)

name: Zapper — Token Ranking
description: Trending tokens ranked by swap activity and adoption velocity, with price data and buyer counts
paramHints: first (optional: number of results, default 10), after (optional: pagination cursor), fid (optional: Farcaster ID for personalized ranking)

name: Zapper — Token Activity Feed
description: Combined activity feed for a specific token: swaps and top Farcaster casts about the token
paramHints: chainId (required: chain ID e.g. 8453), tokenAddress (required: 0x token contract address), fid (optional: Farcaster ID for personalization)

name: Zapper — Search
description: Search for ERC20 tokens, NFT collections, users, and apps by name across all chains. Use to resolve token names to contract addresses.
paramHints: search (required: query string e.g. 'AERO'), categories (optional: array of 'ERC20_TOKEN', 'GAS_TOKEN', 'NFT_COLLECTION', 'USER', 'APP', default ['ERC20_TOKEN']), maxResultsPerCategory (optional: default 5)

name: Zapper — Portfolio Totals
description: Aggregated portfolio value across tokens, DeFi, and NFTs broken down by network for one or more addresses
paramHints: addresses (required: array of 0x wallet addresses), chainIds (optional: array of chain IDs e.g. [8453])

name: Zapper — Token Balances
description: Detailed token holdings with USD values for one or more addresses, optionally filtered by chain
paramHints: addresses (required: array of 0x wallet addresses), first (optional: number of tokens, max 20, default 10), chainIds (optional: array of chain IDs)

name: Zapper — DeFi Balances
description: DeFi positions (liquidity pools, yield farming, lending, staking) for one or more addresses
paramHints: addresses (required: array of 0x wallet addresses), first (optional: number of positions, max 50, default 10), chainIds (optional: array of chain IDs)

name: Zapper — General Swap Feed
description: Real-time feed of swap activity across Farcaster including token trades, volume, and social context
paramHints: No required parameters. Returns latest swap activity with Farcaster social context.

name: Zapper — Transaction History
description: Chronological transaction timeline with human-readable interpretations for one or more addresses
paramHints: subjects (required: array of 0x wallet addresses), perspective (optional: 'All', 'Sent', 'Received', default 'All'), first (optional: number of results, default 10), chainIds (optional: array of chain IDs)

name: Zapper — Account Identity
description: Resolve social identity (ENS, Farcaster, Lens, Basenames) for a wallet address
paramHints: address (required: 0x wallet address)

name: Zapper — Historical Token Price
description: Token price at any historical point in time, useful for PnL calculations and charting
paramHints: address (required: 0x token contract address), chainId (required: chain ID), timestamp (required: unix timestamp in milliseconds), currency (optional: default 'USD')

name: Zapper — NFT Balances
description: Individual NFT holdings with floor prices and estimated values for one or more addresses
paramHints: addresses (required: array of 0x wallet addresses), first (optional: number of NFTs, default 10), sortBy (optional: 'USD_WORTH', 'NETWORK', 'COLLECTION'), chainIds (optional: array of chain IDs)

name: Zapper — NFT Ranking
description: Trending NFT collections ranked by trading volume and popularity, with floor prices and volume stats
paramHints: first (optional: number of results, default 10), after (optional: pagination cursor)

name: Zapper — NFT Collection Metadata
description: NFT collection stats: floor price, market cap, holder count, events, and sample NFTs
paramHints: collections (required: array of objects with 'address' (string) and 'chainId' (integer) for each collection)

name: Zapper — NFT Token Metadata
description: Full metadata for a specific NFT including traits, media, holder info, estimated value, and last sale price
paramHints: collectionAddress (required: 0x collection contract address), chainId (required: chain ID), tokenId (required: specific token ID string)

name: Zapper — Transaction Details
description: Human-readable transaction interpretation with metadata and balance changes for a specific tx hash
paramHints: hash (required: 0x transaction hash), chainId (required: chain ID where the transaction occurred)
